item.title: Five years after Jan. 6, officers describe the toll of defending the CapitolIn his first day in office, Trump pardoned nearly 1,600 people in the Jan. 6th Capitol riot. The country has moved on, but for some the day still looms large.

Video shows ICE agent in Minneapolis fired at driver as vehicle veered past himAn analysis of video footage raises questions about claims by President Donald Trump and Homeland Security Secretary Kristi L. Noem about the fatal shooting in Minneapolis.
The ICE agent’s cellphone video: Five key moments
11 tankers under U.S. sanctions defy blockade in Venezuela, satellite imagery indicates

Videos show security forces firing into crowds in at least six cities across IranA Washington Post review of videos from Iran posted online of recent protests illustrates how widely violence has spread.
